text: Panerai is an Italian company founded by Giovanni Panerai (1825–1897). It is also an Italian surname that may refer to: *Carla Panerai (born 1947), Italian sprint runner *Rolando Panerai (1924–2019), Italian singer *Ruggero Panerai (1862–1923), Italian painter *Umberto Panerai (born 1953), Italian water polo player
title: Panerai (disambiguation)
